verses.verse: And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, when <S%H164>Ehud<s%> was <S%H4191>dead<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4376>sold<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H2985>Jabin<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, that <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in <S%H2674>Hazor<s%>; the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of whose <S%H6635>host<s%> was <S%H5516>Sisera<s%>, which <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H2800>Harosheth<s%> of the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6817>cried<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: for he had <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%>; and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> he <S%H2394>mightily<s%> <S%H3905>oppressed<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
¶ And <S%H1683>Deborah<s%>, a <S%H5031>prophetess<s%>, the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H3941>Lapidoth<s%>, she <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%>.

And she <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> under the palm <S%H8560>tree<s%> of <S%H1683>Deborah<s%> between <S%H7414>Ramah<s%> and <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>: and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> to her for <S%H4941>judgment<s%>.

And she <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1301>Barak<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H42>Abinoam<s%> out of <S%H6943>Kedesh-naphtali<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Hath not the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%>, saying, <S%H3212>Go<s%> and <S%H4900>draw<s%> toward <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8396>Tabor<s%>, and <S%H3947>take<s%> with thee <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> and of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%>?

And I will <S%H4900>draw<s%> unto thee to the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H7028>Kishon<s%> <S%H5516>Sisera<s%>, the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of <S%H2985>Jabin's<s%> <S%H6635>army<s%>, with his <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and his <S%H1995>multitude<s%>; and I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> him into thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>.
And <S%H1301>Barak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, If thou wilt <S%H3212>go<s%> with me, then I will <S%H1980>go<s%>: but if thou wilt not <S%H3212>go<s%> with me, then I will not <S%H3212>go<s%>.

And she <S%H559>said<s%>, I will <S%H1980>surely<s%> <S%H3212>go<s%> with thee: <S%H657>notwithstanding<s%> the <S%H1870>journey<s%> that thou <S%H1980>takest<s%> shall not be for thine <S%H8597>honour<s%>; for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H4376>sell<s%> <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of a <S%H802>woman<s%>. And <S%H1683>Deborah<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> with <S%H1301>Barak<s%> to <S%H6943>Kedesh<s%>.

¶ And <S%H1301>Barak<s%> <S%H2199>called<s%> <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> and <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> to <S%H6943>Kedesh<s%>; and he went <S%H5927>up<s%> with <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> at his <S%H7272>feet<s%>: and <S%H1683>Deborah<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> with him.

Now <S%H2268>Heber<s%> the <S%H7017>Kenite<s%>, which was of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2246>Hobab<s%> the father in <S%H2859>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, had <S%H6504>severed<s%> himself from the <S%H7017>Kenites<s%>, and <S%H5186>pitched<s%> his <S%H168>tent<s%> unto the <S%H436>plain<s%> of <S%H6815>Zaanaim<s%>, which is by <S%H6943>Kedesh<s%>.
And they <S%H5046>shewed<s%> <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> that <S%H1301>Barak<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H42>Abinoam<s%> was gone <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8396>Tabor<s%>.

And <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> gathered <S%H2199>together<s%> all his <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, even <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%>, and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were with him, from <S%H2800>Harosheth<s%> of the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%> unto the <S%H5158>river<s%> of <S%H7028>Kishon<s%>.

And <S%H1683>Deborah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1301>Barak<s%>, <S%H6965>Up<s%>; for this is the <S%H3117>day<s%> in which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> into thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>: is not the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> gone <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee? So <S%H1301>Barak<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8396>Tabor<s%>, and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2000>discomfited<s%> <S%H5516>Sisera<s%>, and all his <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, and all his <S%H4264>host<s%>, with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1301>Barak<s%>; so that <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> lighted <S%H3381>down<s%> off his <S%H4818>chariot<s%>, and fled <S%H5127>away<s%> on his <S%H7272>feet<s%>.

But <S%H1301>Barak<s%> <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, and after the <S%H4264>host<s%>, unto <S%H2800>Harosheth<s%> of the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%>: and all the <S%H4264>host<s%> of <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> upon the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; and there was not a <S%H259>man<s%> <S%H7604>left<s%>.

Howbeit <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> fled <S%H5127>away<s%> on his <S%H7272>feet<s%> to the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H3278>Jael<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H2268>Heber<s%> the <S%H7017>Kenite<s%>: for there was <S%H7965>peace<s%> between <S%H2985>Jabin<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2674>Hazor<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H2268>Heber<s%> the <S%H7017>Kenite<s%>.

¶ And <S%H3278>Jael<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H5516>Sisera<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Turn <S%H5493>in<s%>, my <S%H113>lord<s%>, turn <S%H5493>in<s%> to me; <S%H3372>fear<s%> not. And when he had turned <S%H5493>in<s%> unto her into the <S%H168>tent<s%>, she <S%H3680>covered<s%> him with a <S%H8063>mantle<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, Give me, I pray thee, a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H8248>drink<s%>; for I am <S%H6770>thirsty<s%>. And she <S%H6605>opened<s%> a <S%H4997>bottle<s%> of <S%H2461>milk<s%>, and gave him <S%H8248>drink<s%>, and <S%H3680>covered<s%> him.

Again he <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, Stand <S%H5975>in<s%> the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%>, and it shall be, when any <S%H376>man<s%> doth <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H7592>inquire<s%> of thee, and <S%H559>say<s%>, Is <S%H3426>there<s%> any <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3426>here<s%>? that thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%>, No.

Then <S%H3278>Jael<s%> <S%H2268>Heber's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H3489>nail<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%>, and <S%H7760>took<s%> an <S%H4718>hammer<s%> in her <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H935>went<s%> <S%H3814>softly<s%> unto him, and <S%H8628>smote<s%> the <S%H3489>nail<s%> into his <S%H7541>temples<s%>, and <S%H6795>fastened<s%> it into the <S%H776>ground<s%>: for he was fast <S%H7290>asleep<s%> and <S%H5774>weary<s%>. So he <S%H4191>died<s%>.

And, behold, as <S%H1301>Barak<s%> <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H5516>Sisera<s%>, <S%H3278>Jael<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> him, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H3212>Come<s%>, and I will <S%H7200>shew<s%> thee the <S%H376>man<s%> whom thou <S%H1245>seekest<s%>. And when he <S%H935>came<s%> into her tent, behold, <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> <S%H5307>lay<s%> <S%H4191>dead<s%>, and the <S%H3489>nail<s%> was in his <S%H7541>temples<s%>.
So <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3665>subdued<s%> on that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H2985>Jabin<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3212%H1980>prospered<s%>, and <S%H7186>prevailed<s%> against <S%H2985>Jabin<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, until they had <S%H3772>destroyed<s%> <S%H2985>Jabin<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>.
